help-file.title: "GOD, PTELL"
help-file.content:
Syntax: ptell <player> <text>
This is exactly like tell, except that <text> is broadcast to all gods with petition toggled on, to let them know that you responded to a particular petition.
Example: Oinkoink petitions 'Why is the sky blue?'
You reply: ptell oinkoink shut the hell up before I term you!
Which displays to the gods as: Petition: <your_name> responds to Oinkoink's petition with 'shut the hell up before I term you!' ==========================================================================
# "GOD, PURGE"
